author: Aswathi Pacha
title: Existing drugs that prevent coronavirus replication identified
description: Scientists have mapped out human proteins that interact with those of the virus
content: In a breathtaking feat, nearly a hundred scientists from across the globe worked together to study the genes of the coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) and have published a list of drugs that can be re-purposed to treat COVID-19. They have also mapped out the human prot… [+2366 chars]
